message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate further!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
You think you're getting the majority, but I'm not going to let you take all the cake!
You want the majority, but I'll give you a bit more than that. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the lion's share!
You think I'm desperate, but I'm not going to let you take the lion's share without a fight!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me! Meet me in the middle!
You're being too soft, I'll take what I can get!
You're getting greedy, but I'm not going to let you take all the crumbs!
I'm not going to give you the whole pie, but I'll give you a bigger slice than you're asking for. Take it or leave it!
